name: 1-Click Email URL

manifest.name: 1-Click Email URL
manifest.description: Click to email any URL with one click

permissions.name: tabs
permissions.description: Grants the extension access to privileged fields of the Tab objects used by several APIs including chrome.tabs and chrome.windows. In many circumstances the extension will not need to declare the tabs permission to make use of these APIs.
